title: [Large-Scale] Web-Based Problem-Solving Skills Enhancement Program (PROUD) for Design Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic design theory and proficiency in fundamental technical skills
context.additional_context: A design education course conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments. Learners possess intermediate domain expertise with professional backgrounds, with performance measured through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners improve self-efficacy in problem-solving processes by over 20% after 14 weeks of utilizing the PROUD system.
Learners can apply design problem-solving strategies (problem definition, idea generation, implementation planning) with over 80% accuracy.
Learners demonstrate problem-solving skills by submitting design project deliverables reflecting peer feedback at least three times.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
